mapper.sql: a.id, a.college_id AS "college.id", a.section, a.year, a.highest, a.lowest, a.average, a.batch, a.remarks, a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.ext1, a.ext2, a.ext3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_college_historical_line a( a.id, a.college_id AS "college.id", a.section, a.year, a.highest, a.lowest, a.average, a.batch, a.remarks, a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.ext1, a.ext2, a.ext3 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{college.id}, #{year}, #{highest}, #{lowest}, #{average}, #{batch}, #{remarks}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{ext1}, #{ext2}, #{ext3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_college_historical_line a SET a.college_id = #{college.id}, a.section = #{section}, a.year = #{year}, a.highest = #{highest}, a.lowest = #{lowest}, a.average = #{average}, a.batch = #{batch}, a.remarks = #{remarks}, a.update_date = #{updateDate}, a.ext1, a.ext2, a.ext3 WHERE id = #{id}
